appDesc.description: The 132 char description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Use Voice Recognition to fill out forms and dictate email with speech to text. Control the Internet with custom voice commands!

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

chrome_pages_error.message: NOTE: Extensions are not allowed on special chrome:// or edge:// pages or the Chrome Webstore or Edge Add-Ons page such as the page on the last tab.

chrome_runtime_error.message: . NOTE: You must reload the web page you were trying to use speech recognition on before this extension will work on it.

cws_link.description: Version 1.4.9 - Chrome web store link for SRA or SRA365

disable_commands_msg.message: Voice commands are disabled in Settings.

disable_speech2text_msg.message: Speech to text (dictation) is disabled in Settings.

icon.description: Version 1.4.0 - Icon for SRA and SRA365

network_error.message: Reinstalling Chrome or doing a Chrome Reset may help fix this error.

pause_for_audio_msg.message: Speech Recognition is paused until all tabs have stopped playing audio. (See Settings).

signin.message: Sign in to browser or enter Order Number.
